name: winrm
long_help:
Execute commands remotely via WinRM

Usage:
  -i,  hostname/ip of target system
  -u,  username to authenticate as
  -p,  password used to authenticate
  -c,  command to execute remotely (must be last arguement passed)

Example:
  winrm -- -i dc.snaplabs.local -u snaplabs.local\\domain_admin -p P@ssword1 -c dir c:\\users
